closePetition(uint256).details: The petition should ofcourse exist and only the creator can call this method.

createPetition(string,string,string,stri.details: Cannot be run if not an user or if the contract is paused!

params._description: A longer description means a more expensive petition deploy, in future it should be limited.
params._ipfs_banner: if the ipfs hash given is empty or not valid, a placeholder is shown clientside
params._name: Name is not unique cannot be used as key
params._targetSigns: for now this value is just cosmetic, it could be used to close a petition automatically, or for other triggers

createUser(string,string,string).details: Cannot be run if already an user or if the contract is paused!

params._ens: (crosschecking the validity of an ens in solidity is expensive, it's easier doing it client side)
params._ipfs_avatar: if the ipfs hash given is empty or not valid, a placeholder is shown clientside

getSignaturesFromIndex(uint256,uint256).details: The conditional if is present to allow in the future an user to withdrawn his signature. (Not implemented right now)

params.index: The index parameters should be smaller than the total signatures of the petition!
params.petitionId: the petition existance is checked with the corresponding modifier

getSignaturesFromIndex(uint256,uint256).return: name, ens, ipfs_avatar (User struct decomposed for solidity limitations) and signing address

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

signPetition(uint256).details: Cannot be run if not an user, if the contract is paused, if you already signed, if the petition doesn't exist or is closed!

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

closePetition(uint256).notice: Close the petition not allowing more users to sign it

createUser(string,string,string).notice: Create an user giving a name and eventually an ens and an ipfs hash rapresenting an image

getSignaturesFromIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Obtain the information about a single signature.

signPetition(uint256).notice: Sign a petition, registering your data ad increasing the sign count
